head.title: DISTINCTIVE COLLEGE PREP: HARPER WOODS - Home

meta.content: Distinctive College Prep (DCP) - Harper Woods is a school of choice, a tuition-free, public charter school. Join our family today, by applying online!

meta.name: description
meta.content: Distinctive College Prep (DCP) - Harper Woods is a school of choice, a tuition-free, public charter school. Join our family today, by applying online!

div.style: height: auto;vertical-align: middle;background-image: url("/uploads/8/4/9/1/84911918/background-images/830086796.jpg") ;background-repeat: no-repeat ;background-position: 100.00% 18.41% ;background-size: 100% ;background-color: transparent ;background-size: cover;background-attachment: fixed;

div.font:
The safety of our students and staff is our top priority. In accordance with state and federal authorities, and in order to suppress any potential spread of COVID-19 (Coronavirus) within our community, Distinctive Schools school buildings are temporarily closed.
For detailed information, please visit our updates page, ​and follow us on social media – Facebook • Instagram • Twitter.
If you have any questions, please reach out to contact@distinctiveschools.org.

div.span: Distinctive College Prep (DCP) - Harper Woods is a public charter school. DCP
is managed by Distinctive Schools, a non-profit organization dedicated to

supporting each child in becoming an engaged and curious learner, a confident self-advocate, and a creative problem-solver by setting high expectations and nurturing a positive culture that honors diversity, collaboration, and optimism.

span.span: We are a culture of innovators, and boldly believe that families, students and staff have the ideas that will change the world of our students. We are excited to be working with the community, family and students of the Harper Woods area.

br.br: Together, we hope to positively positively impact students in and outside of the classroom. All teaching learning and operations at Distinctive Schools is rooted in a safe, joyful and kind culture for everyone. We truly believe and live that if you "do what you love, you love what you do." We never stop working together at all levels of our organization to ensure that people, relationships and empathy are at the core of our work and the most powerful force in the future of our students.​

td.div: Follow our journey – follow us on social media, and catch up with what we're up to on the Distinctive Schools Blog!
